creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: unsigned; sailboat with 3 sails at center; reflection of sailboat in rippling water; hint of shore with other boats and reeds in distance at L
inscription: LLC, in pencil: Sail boat-Dry Point
text: Not listed in complete catalogue of Yoshida Hiroshi.
title: Sail Boat
